short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pricklr: Simplified Price Tracking by Democrateyes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pricklr is a simplified price tracking app. Click on the icon on a product page and we'll send you an email when the item goes on sale. How easy is that?

Feel free to let us know anything else you'd find helpful!

And if you like makeup, please sign up for our new product recommendation app, Democrateyes at http://democrateyes.com
